spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout is only partially aligned: the two-bedroom + central living/dining concept is present, but key spaces from the 2D plan are not represented correctly. The 2D plan has two distinct decks/balconies (large deck off Living/Dining and small deck off Bed-1); the 3D render does not clearly model these as separate, correctly located exterior spaces. The Utility (5' x 7'8") connected to the Kitchen is not clearly present as a separate room. Bathroom locations/entry orientations appear simplified and do not match the plan’s exact placements. Window/opening placement is largely inconsistent with the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness appears visually consistent, but the plan’s structural program is not faithfully preserved: missing decks and missing/merged utility substantially reduce fidelity. Adjacencies are partially correct (bedrooms connect to living zone), but the plan-specific relationships (Living-to-deck, Kitchen-to-utility, toilet placements) are not reliably reproduced. Doors are embedded as openings, but their exact positions and swing/orientation information from the 2D plan is not preserved.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is plausible but does not map tightly to the 2D layout: kitchen fit-out differs (appears more open/peninsula-like than the enclosed L-shaped kitchen), and living/dining furniture arrangement is generic versus the plan. Furniture scaling is generally consistent and not severely distorted.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean and readable with decent lighting and consistent geometry. Isometric-style view is appropriate, though it is not strictly orthographic (perspective/foreshortening present). Overall presentation quality is good despite plan mismatches.

detected_errors.description: Missing large deck/balcony connected to Living/Dining (13'9" x 5') as shown on the 2D plan.
Missing or not clearly represented small deck/balcony connected to Bed-1 (5'8" x 4'5") in the correct location.
Utility room (5' x 7'8") adjacent to Kitchen is missing or merged into another space in the 3D render.
Kitchen enclosure and counter geometry do not match the 2D plan’s enclosed L-shaped kitchen; 3D depicts a more open kitchen configuration.
Bathroom placement appears simplified/misaligned relative to the plan (Toi-1 and C.Toi positions and their relationship to adjacent rooms are not clearly preserved).
Door placement/orientation (swing and exact doorway locations for bedrooms/bathrooms/foyer connections) does not match the 2D plan details.
Window/opening placement is largely inconsistent with the 2D plan; several exterior-window runs shown in plan are not represented or are reduced to plain walls.
Room proportion relationships appear distorted (living/dining-to-bedroom and foyer/passage sizing not consistent with labeled dimensions in the 2D plan).
Hallucinated/unsupported interior elements: kitchen peninsula/island-like massing and some generic furnishing layouts not supported by the 2D plan.
